data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 20174
data.actual_result: you can submit something empty in those boxes and have to wait to get submitted
data.expected_result: Spectate and Ask To Join should disable you from submitting nothing and for you to wait
data.short_description: [Website bug] discordapp.com/developers/applications/[YOURAPPID]/rich-presence/settings You can submit an empty “Ask to join” submission, same goes for Spectate https://i.imgur.com/7Va3HIY.png
data.steps_to_repro: - Make an app - Go to [YOURAPPID]/rich-presence/settings and replacd [YOURAPPID] to your App's client ID - Just connect via Simple Presence, that's what I did, connect it if you can, if you don't know how to, leave it up for someone else to approve - Don't put anything in the boxes and submit it
